answers.answer: Ask to be given a blood test. They are much more accurate.

Hi Toni, I agree about asking for a blood test. Also, lots of OTC meds have alcohol in them. Things like NyQuil, liquid cold meds, even mouthwash, and such. Are you taking anything like that?  Good luck!
My daughter used to work for a monitoring company and she said deodorant will also give a positive reading.Ask for a blood test as IBK stated.
Wow!!  I didnt even know that showed in urine!!  Crazy how so many things can make a false positive!!
I don't take any OTC products.  Ive been very careful.  I really think it has to do with my diabetes.

I go to a suboxone clinic and I asked for a blood test.  They said no and I should admit that I was drinking  Im very frustrated because I don't touch alcohol I haven't had a drink even socially in 15 years.

question: I don't drink but my urine tests are positive for alcohol.  Im also diabetic. Im about to be kicked off a suboxone program and I feel helpless.
title: What causes a positive result for alcohol in a urine test if you don't drink?
